channel.title: DL client
channel.description: Okay so I just dunno anymore, can someone just tell me step by step, how to make a downloadable client, well atleast from here.. I have my server online, I have a jar maker, I have my IP in and one guy could play my server but he had all the files, how do I make it so they just have to download the client and the cache and are able to play?

item.title: DL client
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

So I have to change the link to the cache? How do I do that? And what do I change it to? But so this is what I have to do

1.) Change the link to the cache
2.) Jar the client and the cache
3.) Upload the jarred client and cache
4.) People download and can play whenever I’m running the source.

Is that right?

Read full topic

item.title: DL client
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

That depends on what you mean by that. If you want to jar it so they just download and run the jar, change the link the client gets the cache from and re-jar it.

Read full topic
